text: "Bright Lights" is the third single from Matchbox Twenty's third album, More Than You Think You Are. The song proved to be a moderate hit for the band. It peaked at 23 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song is written by lead singer Rob Thomas. It is about a girl who leaves her hometown looking for fame. Throughout the song, he lets the girl know she can come home if things don't work out. ==Charts== Chart (2003) Peak position US Billboard Hot 100 23 US Billboard Pop Songs 15 US Billboard Adult Pop Songs 2 == References == Category:2003 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Matchbox Twenty songs
title: Bright Lights (Matchbox Twenty song)
